DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct 1. ass whether SLM0807 alters pharmacodynamics HKB0701 2. estimate pharmacodynamics HKB0701 multiple administration CJ30001 multiple co-administration HKB0701/SLM0807 healthy subject
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacodynamic Study SLM0807 , HKB0701 CJ30001 Healthy Subject
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer age range 2050years weight range exceed Â±20 % ideal weight . Ideal weight = [ height 100 ] *0.9 Subjects history significant chronic disease Subjects FPG < 100mg/dL 2hr glucose 75g OGTT < 140mg/dL Judged good health basis vital sign , ECG , physical exam routine laboratory data Available entire study period Willing adhere protocol requirement sign inform consent form Subjects take drug induce inhibit hepatic enzyme activity within 30days prior drug administration Subjects symptom acute illness within 4 week prior drug administration Subjects history clinically significant allergy include drug allergy Subjects whose clinical laboratory test value outside accept normal range ( Especially , AST ALT > 1.25 time normal range total bilirubin > 1.5times normal range ) Subjects history drug , caffeine abuse ( caffeine drink > 5cups/day ) Subjects history alcohol abuse ( alcohol > 30g/day ) ever drank alcohol within 7 day prior drug administration Heavy smoker ( > 10cigarettes/day ) Subjects diet know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug ( especially , consumption grapefruit juice ) Subjects donate plasma within 60days prior drug administration Subjects participate clinical study within 90days prior drug administration Subjects receive drug might confound result trial opinion principal investigator within 10days prior drug administration ( cimetidine within 7days prior drug administration ) Female subject pregnant , breastfeed use medically acceptable birth control
